title: Demand outstrips radar satellite supply
summary: NASA announced plans to bring data from ICEYE US into its Commercial Smallsat Data Acquisition program under a five-year indefinite-delivery, indefinite-quantity contract after evaluating the suitability of ICEYE's SAR data for NASA Earth Science research.
why_it_matters: This contract signifies the growing recognition of commercial SAR data's value for civil government agencies and highlights ICEYE's role in supplying critical Earth observation data to a major space agency.
